description:
Versatile pants for all things outside in the summer. Four-way stretch, and lightweight fabric give you room to hurdle streams and step over logs.

  • Four-way stretch fabric is both durable and gives full freedom of movement
  • Articulated knees let the pants move with you
  • Two hand pockets, zippered side pocket and back pocket with flap keeps essentials close by
  • Regular fit offers no surprises, just comfort
name: Fjallraven Abisko Trail Stretch Trousers - Women's
